Information:
This is open source bot for stashing in Telegram Messenger.
The code you can find here: https://github.com/dmitrydnl/StashBot
RegistrationWarning:
If you have already registered you will lose all your old data!
Are you sure? /yes or /no
SuccessRegistration:
Success!
Now you can auth with password
PasswordCharacters: Password can contain only letters, numbers and special characters!
Login:
Input message to save it in stash.
Get messages in stash: /Stash
Logout: /logout
FullStashError: Your stash is full, delete your message!
